meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched sound or call to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The lost hiker cooeed loudly for help.
meanings.sent2: She cooeed to her friend across the field.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel cooeed to the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The whistle cooeed like a bird in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The child cooeed with excitement when she saw the puppies.

meanings.definition: A high-pitched sound or call used to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The cooeed echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The bird's cooeed caught the attention of the other birds.
meanings.sent3: The cooeed of the toy phone made the baby giggle.
meanings.sent4: The cooeed of the tea kettle was a welcome sound in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The cooeed of the whistle signaled the start of the race.
